version_description:
Share Your Profile:
Share your AmpMe profile on social networks so that friends and family can follow your profile, join your parties and occasionally judge your taste in music

React in Parties:
You can now send even bigger hearts and see the total number of hearts sent in a party!

YouTube:
Connect your YouTube Account and find your playlists, subscriptions & liked videos

Playlists:
Shuffle your playlists

And as always, we also made sure to squash a few of those pesky bugs.

Collect coins and spend them on stickers! You can now collect coins every time you:
- Start a party
- Invite a friend to join a party
And as always, we focused on cleaning up all those pesky bugs so that the app can work better than ever!

If you <3 the app, make sure to drop a review and if you have any questions, please email support@ampme.com!

We’re keeping it on the lighter side for this update..Don’t fret though, we’ve got some awesome announcements coming soon!

Here are a few things that you can now do in AmpMe:
Show love to all your friends by sending floaty hearts in the chat (We fully support spamming them).
Customize your profile by adding your name & a photo of yourself (We want to make sure your friends know who is responsible for those sick beats).
Invite friends via your phone contacts! (That random guy in math class who you text for notes could become your musical soul mate, you never know!)

Love the app? Show us some love and write us a review in the app store! If you run into an issue, please let us know at support@ampme.com

Introducing our brand new Discovery Screen!! We’ve done some major updates and improvements to make it easier to party more than ever. Here is what you can expect to find on our new home screen:

- Global Live Parties: these are 24/7 ongoing parties with some dope playlists, that will let you party with other users all over the globe!
- Friend’s Parties: see what your friends are listening to so you can share the love in the party with our reactions button… or roast their song choice ;)
- Nearby Parties: Check out what other users around you are listening to and chat with them in their parties
- Recommended Profiles: Follow other users and discover new music!!

We’ve also done some housekeeping and squashed a few bugs to that the sync works better than ever.

Love the app? Show us some love and write us a review in the app store! If you run into an issue, please let us know at support@ampme.com

- Global Live Parties: these are 24/7 ongoing parties with some dope playlists, that will let you party with other users all over the globe!

Love the app? Show us some love and write us a review in the app store! If you run into an issue, please let us know at support@ampme.com

This update is so major, you won't even know what has hit you ;)

Discovery Screen:
Better than ever! Check out the new design

YouTube:
Rotate your screen and watch videos on landscape mode
Login with Google and access your YouTube account, songs and playlists

Account:
Log into your account from a device

Don’t worry, we also did some housekeeping ;) We squished and squashed all those little bugs, and made the UI better along the way so that the sync is always on point.

Love the app? Show us some love and write us a review in the app store! If you run into an issue, please let us know at support@ampme.com :)

Share Your Profile:
Share your AmpMe profile on social networks so that friends and family can follow your profile, join your parties and occasionally judge your taste in music

React in Parties:
You can now send even bigger hearts and see the total number of hearts sent in a party!

YouTube:
Connect your YouTube Account and find your playlists, subscriptions & liked videos

Playlists:
Shuffle your playlists

And as always, we also made sure to squash a few of those pesky bugs.

Private Parties
You asked and we listened! Private parties will no longer be discoverable on home screens. The host will now have to invite all guests into party ;) The host can do this by selecting the “Add Friends” button on the bottom right side of the party.

And as always, we also made sure to squash a few of those pesky bugs and optimize AmpMe so that it works better than ever!

Love the app? Show us some love and write us a review in the app store! If you run into an issue, please let us know at support@ampme.com :)

Bug Fixes:
We did a little housekeeping and squashed lots of those pesky bugs, so that AmpMe works better than ever!

Love AmpMe? Show us some <3 and write us a review in the app store! If you run into an issue, please let us know at support@ampme.com :)

We are excited to announce SoundCloud Go/Go+* is back!

What if you don’t have a Go/Go+ account?
No worries You can’t access your account, but you can still listen to popular playlists on shuffle mode

We did some serious housekeeping and cleaned up all those pesky bugs, to make sure things run better than EVER! :D

Love AmpMe? Write a review or let us know what you think at support@ampme.com!

*SoundCloud is only available in countries where SoundCloud Go/Go+ is accessible. See countries here: https://goo.gl/y62XQ8

This version cleans up the place by squashing a few more bugs and improvements on our sync technology:
- Fixed a bug when leaving a party and the app was freezing
- Fixed a bug in the player queue where a track could have been displayed twice
- Improved sync technology speed and accuracy

Deezer is finally here, login with you account and access all your favorite artists, songs and playlists.

Other smaller updates and tune-ups

Show some <3 drop a review and if you have any questions, send us an email support@ampme.com

Deezer is finally here, login with your account and access all your favorite artists, songs and playlists.

Show some <3 drop a review and if you have any questions, send us an email support@ampme.com

This version fixes the following issue:
- Automatic disconnection from Deezer every hour

You can now auto sync with the host device in one simple step, no more off sync parties!

Deezer is finally here, login with you account and access all your favorite artists, songs and playlists.

Other smaller updates and tune-ups

Show some <3 drop a review and if you have any questions, send us an email support@ampme.com

You can now use our Auto-Sync feature to connect an unlimited amount of nearby phones to the party without having to worry about your music and videos being off sync from one device to the other.

Expand the party like never before by connecting your home sound system speakers directly from the app using AirPlay.

Crushed the bug that was causing private parties unavailable for nearby friends


Minor tune-ups in the UI

Don’t forget to drop a review or send us an email to support@ampme.com if you have any questions <3

Fixed an issue preventing some videos to load.

We have a brand new tech to stream your local music to your guests! We could describe it at length... In a nutshell, it's just better!
Party detection has been improved, we made sure you never miss your friends' party!
We also enhanced as usual our AutoSync, making it more reliable than ever.
Also, some UI/UX Tune ups, and the usual bug fixes.

Drop a review or send us an email to support@ampme.com if you have any questions <3

Introducing AmpMe video chat!!! Now you can party with your friends from anywhere and listen to music in sync all while video chatting!!!

We’ve also added the ability to login to AmpMe using your Apple ID.

Lastly, some UI/UX Tune ups and the usual minor bug fixes.

Drop a review or send us an email to support@ampme.com if you have any questions <3
